name: Allan McNish
introduction: Allan McNish is a former Formula One racing driver who competed during the 2002 Formula One Season for the Toyota team. Aside from a single season as a Formula One racing driver, McNish was a prominent Formula One test driver during the 1990s, testing for both the McLaren and Benetton teams. McNish tested for the Renault team during the 2003 season before making his final retirement from the sport. McNish has been more successful as a Sports Car driver winning the 24 Hours of Le Mans three times in 1998, 2008 and 2013.
